title: Daggers
content:
Daggers in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Daggers are Light, Finesse, Simple Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-4 Damage without enchantments. Daggers can additionally be Thrown, dealing the same damage they would when used for a melee attack. They have a melee range of 1.5m, and deal Piercing Damage, though some special Daggers also deal another type of Damage as well.
